description: U with decorated branching at top

features.description: Number of branches on each lip
Are the branches closed with horizontal strokes? 0 = no, 1 = yes
Do the branches only occur on left or right, inside or outside? 0 = balanced, 1 = left, 2 = right, 3 = inside, 4 = outside
Do the branches have horizontal lines decorating them? 0 = no, 1 = yes
